member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout
member.summary:
The text input layout control adds decorative elements such as floating label, icons, and assistive labels on the top of the input views such as SfMaskedEdit, SfNumericTextBox, Entry, and Editor controls. Key features,
Displays floating label when the input view is focused
Displays error label
Supports filled and outlined container types
Displays leading and trailing icons
Displays help label
Displays maximum characters count
Toggles password visibility

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ShowHintProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to display the hint text.
member.value: true if show hint; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.EnableHintAnimationProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable animation for the hint text when the input view is focused or unfocused.
member.value: true if enable hint animation; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ShowCharCountProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to display the character count when the value is changed.
member.value: true if enable counter; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.ShowHelperTextProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to display the helper text.
member.value: true if show helper text; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.HasErrorProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether it has validation errors.
member.value: true if has error; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to float the label when it is focused or unfocused.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.EnablePasswordVisibilityToggleProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to show the password visibility toggle.
member.value: true if enable password visibility toggle; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TextInputLayout.SfTextInputLayout.outlinedPadding
member.summary: Gets or sets the top and bottom padding of the input view when container type was outlined.
member.remarks: As per spec, total control padding is 36 and outlined top/bottom padding is 16. But we have applied top margin as 8 for resolving floated label cropping issue So outlined padding should be 14.

member.summary: Gets or sets as value to customize the stroke width in focused state, it is applicable for the bottom line and outline border when setting the container type as filled and outlined respectively.
member.value: The default value is 2.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to bounce SfDataGrid body region only with TransitionMode-Push or SfDataGrid to bounce with HeaderRow also(default layout).

member.summary: Provides notifications regarding the pulling action with the progress value and an out parameter to cancel the pulling event.
member.param: progress value of the pulling action.
If cancel is set to true, pulling will be cancelled

member.summary: Provides notifications regarding the refreshing action.
